Test Description: Check complex WHERE conditions for patients API

Request Body.pql: SELECT [patients.primary_subscriber_patient_id], [patients.referred_by_patient_id] FROM [patients] WHERE [patients.primary_subscriber_patient_id] IS NOT NULL AND [patients.referred_by_patient_id] IS NOT NULL

Expected Results: Should return records meeting both conditions on primary_subscriber_patient_id and referred_by_patient_id
